title: Earthbound
content:
Critiques welcome. Three variants in this release: Regular, Condensed Bold, and Condensed Bold Italic.

Available here:  
 [http://openfontlibrary.org/font/earthbound](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233010/http:/openfontlibrary.org/font/earthbound)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EBfontSample_6716.png)

Kinda wondering if it's even condensed enough to call "Condensed."

Thanks!
author: r_alex_hall

comments.content:
Condensed? No condensed here.  
If you're talking about letter spacing you could say that it's a bit too tight, but not condensed.

But to get a better feel for this font it would help to give it beat more leading as it does have a rather high x-height.

Ok, thx. Maybe a lower x-height would be better . . . and if I stick with that spacing, maybe it would be semi-condensed?

I think I have a new version of this that just needs a few tweaks and then I can upload an update . . .
